result.execSummary:
The defendant Lindsay E. Porter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 3:51 Defendant Lindsay E. Porter in court, in custody.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Probation Agent Sadie Zolnik present in court and requests 30 days conditional jail time. Thorie: agrees with recommendation. Def agrees with recommendation. Court orders 30 days conditional jail time. Huber allowed for treatment/assessment if the jail allows. Release date of December 17, 2016. Huber will be allowed for employement.
from Probation/Parole Agent S Zolnik re: Probation Review/Modification request. Requesting 30 conditional days jail with huber so Def can complete assessement at PCDHS.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Defendant Lindsay E. Porter in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Thorie: guilty to charge. 2 years probation; concurrent with ES currently on. Loberg and Def agree.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def.   Constitutional rights explained to defendant.   Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas guilty to charge: Loberg stipulates to factual basis.  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. Court finds and adjudicates Def guilty of charge. Loberg addresses sentencing. Def addresses the court. Court: S/W 2 years probation; concurrent to ES concurrently on. Conditions: court costs, DNA sample and surcharge. full cooperate with investigation and prosecution of any co defendants.

8:45  Defendant Lindsay E. Porter in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Information is on file. Reading of information is waived.   DEF PLEADS NOT GUILTY to charges in the information. Court reviews the bond conditions with the defendant.

10:43  Defendant Lindsay E. Porter in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Written waiver of preliminary hearing is filed and the court reviews with the defendant. Court approves the waiver and binds the defendant over. Arraignment will be set for a different date.  Information is filed with the court. Bond will continue. Address changed. Bond conditions are reviewed with the defendant.
